description:
An ancient Pokémon with strange marks all over its body, Alakazam is a Pokémon that was worshiped by the people of the ancient Pokémopolis city.
After another ancient Pokémon, Gengar, was reawakened, a Pokémon archaeologist was taken control by the artifact Alakazam was in and soon it was awaken also.
Both Alakazam and Gengar begun to battle causing distruction to the local area. A singing Jigglypuff managed to awaken a final ancient Pokémon, a Jigglypuff, which then sang to put both Alakazam and Gengar to sleep and returned them both to their relics.
name: Foodin
